column1: Performance Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom. DevOps Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. Cloud Functions Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. Cache Invalidation Event Sourcing Optimization

Distributed Systems DNS Routing Cache Invalidation Version Control Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations. Dream big and dare to fail. IoT Great things never come from comfort zones. React Load Balancing JWT Opportunities don't happen. You create them. To be the best
column2: you must be able to handle the worst.
